title: Skypecast query
author: VD
content_html:
Is anyone interested in participating in a weekly Skypecast to discuss the Monday column? I found an add-on software that allows for recording it in MP3 format which would allow for a participatory podcast of sorts. It will probably take some experimentation to make it run smoothly, but that’s what test-runs are for.

Anyhow, if you’re interested, email me your Skype name.

UPDATE: I’ve already heard from a few interested folks, so we’ll give it a whirl. I’ve scheduled a cast for 2:30 PM Central under the name Voxic Shock. I’ll do a brief mono and then start taking questions. I have no idea if there will be five people or fifty on the cast, so please don’t get annoyed if it’s closer to the latter I don’t get to your question. If it works, perhaps I’ll post an MP3 of it here.
content_text:
Is anyone interested in participating in a weekly Skypecast to discuss the Monday column?  I found an add-on software that allows for recording it in MP3 format which would allow for a participatory podcast of sorts.  It will probably take some experimentation to make it run smoothly, but that’s what test-runs are for.
Anyhow, if you’re interested, email me your Skype name.
UPDATE: I’ve already heard from a few interested folks, so we’ll give it a whirl.  I’ve scheduled a cast for 2:30 PM Central under the name Voxic Shock.  I’ll do a brief mono and then start taking questions.  I have no idea if there will be five people or fifty on the cast, so please don’t get annoyed if it’s closer to the latter I don’t get to your question.  If it works, perhaps I’ll post an MP3 of it here.
